original: Refused to Import Food
translation: 拒绝进口食品

original: Our nation's refusal to relax trade barriers during a time of food shortage has caused uproar among the affected.
translation: 我们的国家拒绝在粮食短缺的时候放松贸易壁垒，这在受影响人群中引起了轩然大波。

original: Buying American
translation: 购买美洲货

original: We have relaxed barriers of trade to allow imports from our neighbor's colony in America.
translation: 我们已经消弭了贸易壁垒，我们现在可以从邻国的美洲殖民地进口商品。

original: Importing Cocoa
translation: 进口可可豆

original: Our large imports of chocolate and cocoa bring joy and reinvigoration to our people.
translation: 我们大量的进口巧克力和可可豆为人民带来了欢乐与振奋。

original: Importing Coffee
translation: 进口咖啡

original: Our large coffee imports are keeping the people happy and vigilant.
translation: 我们大量进口的咖啡使人民保持快乐与清醒。

original: Importing Tea
translation: 进口茶叶

original: Our large imports of tea please the sophisticated members of society.
translation: 我们大量进口的茶叶取悦了社会精英阶层。

original: Importing Food to Combat Famine
translation: 进口粮食以对抗饥荒

original: The recent food shortage in parts of our nation has caused many among the [Root.GetAdjective] to question trade policies which prevent imports of vital goods. People are calling for trade barriers to be relaxed, hoping that the crisis can be mitigated by buying food from more fortunate nations.
translation: 最近一段时间的粮食短缺使[Root.GetAdjective]地区的不少人质疑我们的贸易政策阻碍了至关重要的食品进口。 人们呼吁削弱贸易壁垒,希望这场危机可以经由从更富足的国家购买食物得到缓解。

original: In this time of need, lives matter more than politics.
translation: 在这样一个食物短缺的时候，人的生命比政治重要。

original: We must strive to be self-sufficient, even when we are not.
translation: 即使在这样一个食物短缺的时候，我们也要竭尽全力地做到自给自足。

original: Imports Compete with [Root.GetAdjective] Quality Goods
translation: 进口商品与来自[Root.GetAdjective]的高质量产品竞争

original: Our neighbors have established a large colonial presence in the New World. The exports from this distant land have been steadily increasing, and some of the exotic goods have become very popular, even among those who should know better than to be dazzled by curiosities.\n\nRecently, our neighbors have gone further, openly fuelling this interest. Encouraging people to 'buy American', they are pushing for more imports from the colonies, outcompeting our own goods and depriving good [Root.GetAdjective] people of work. We might get something out of this influx of foreign trade, but the safest option would be to erect barriers to reduce it.
translation: 我们的邻国在新大陆建立了一个庞大的殖民地。来自那个遥远大陆的商品数量一直在稳步增加，其中一些异国情调的商品已经很受人们欢迎，甚至在那些通常不会被好奇心冲昏了头脑的人群中也是如此。\n\n最近，我们的邻居走得更远，公然助长这种兴趣。鼓励人们「购买美洲货」，他们推动从殖民地更多进口，将我们的商品排挤出市场，夺走了良善的[Root.GetAdjective]居民们的工作机会。我们或许能从这种国际贸易中获取一些利益，但是更保险的选择是树立贸易壁垒来减少贸易往来。

original: Let's see what the colonies have to offer.
translation: 让我们来看看殖民地能够提供些什么。

original: Nothing of decent quality could come from these backwater upstarts.
translation: 这些乡下暴发户没啥体面的东西。

original: Importing Iron
translation: 进口铁

original: We strive to keep the [Root.GetAdjective] military strong, modern and domestically supported, but sometimes our priorities end up in conflict with each other. Lacking the rich iron mines of our neighbors, some of our grander plans for future military development will not be possible as soon as we might wish. Increasing imports is a tempting option, but relying on foreign support might compromise our trade policies... although a knife in the back of our neighbor would be all the more brilliantly insidious if made from their own steel.
translation: 我们努力保持[Root.GetAdjective]军事力量的强大、现代化并受到国内支持，但有时候我们的优先目标最终会互相冲突。由于缺乏来自邻国的富铁矿，我国未来军事发展的一些宏伟计划无法像我们所期望的那样尽快实现了。增加进口量是一个诱人的选择，但是依赖于外国进口可能会损害我国的贸易政策……话虽如此，假如刺入邻国后背的尖刀是由他们自己的钢铁铸造的，那是多美妙多阴险的一件事情啊。

original: We need imported iron for our fist.
translation: 我们需要为我们的武装力量进口铁.

original: We need to rely on our own resources. Heart matters more than iron.
translation: 我们需要依靠自己的资源，一颗勇敢的心比钢铁更重要。

original: Importing Naval Supplies
translation: 进口海军用品

original: Ambitions to improve our nation's navy has recently come to a halt. The [Root.GetAdjective] shipbuilders don't lack ideas or plans, but supplies. Some of them cannot help but notice, they claim, that our neighbor has an abundance of materials that would be useful in equipping a modern navy. We try not to make our fleet dependent on foreign support, but if these policies stand in the way of progress, perhaps we could import just enough to test the new shipbuilding techniques.
translation: 提升我国海军实力的野心最近遇到了些许阻碍。[Root.GetAdjective]的造船工匠们不缺乏造船的能力，但缺乏物资。他们中的一些人不禁注意到这个问题，他们宣称，我们的邻国拥有充足的材料，可以用来打造一支现代化的海军。我们尽可能的不使我们的舰队依赖于国外的资源，但是如果这些政策阻碍了进步，也许我们可以进口刚够测试新的造船技术的材料。

original: We can compromise if it puts some plans in motion.
translation: 如果这样做真的能够让造船计划动起来的话，那么我们可以妥协.

original: Ships from foreign wood? It'd be safer to fashion them from the rock!
translation: 用外国进口的木材做的船？那还不如用石头做来得安全呢!

original: $TRADER$, Controversial Protectionist
translation: $TRADER$，备受争议的地方保护主义者

original: Since $TRADER$ started providing advice for the trade developments in [Root.GetName], internal trade has been strengthened at the cost of curtailed imports and increased state regulation. While their decisions to improve infrastructure have been appreciated, recent suggestions have caused many influential people to question their philosophy. They argue that the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] is taking $TRADER$'s advice too readily, and that we should look for mutually beneficial deals with other nations rather than seeking to dominate every area of trade.
translation: 自从$TRADER$开始在贸易发展方面为[Root.GetName]建言，国内贸易被大大发展，代价则是进口的萎缩和国家管理的加强。然而，在加强基础设施建设的决定受到赞赏的同时，他们最近的一些建议也导致许多有影响力的人士质疑他的贸易哲学。他们认为[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]太过于偏信$TRADER$的建议，我国应该更多地去和别的国家达成一些双赢的协议，而不是试图在每个贸易领域都获得统治性地位。

original: $TRADER$'s thinking has helped us so far.
translation: 到目前为止，$TRADER$的想法帮了我们的大忙。

original: A trader should facilitate free trade, not restrict it.
translation: 贸易者应该促进自由贸易，而非限制它。

original: Radical Reforms
translation: 激进的改革

original:
Two of our most trusted advisors, $MASTER_OF_MINT$ and $TRADER$, have been talking a lot recently. Plotting, some say. Drafting plans for [Root.GetName]'s future, others say. Whatever they are discussing, it's clearly controversial enough to warrant some secrecy.

Finally, they approach [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] to present the results. The thick stack of papers contains plans for monumental changes to the nation's trade practices, including increased protectionism, regulation and industrial policy. Radical, some would say.
'Necessary,' $MASTER_OF_MINT$ says.
'Profitable,' says $TRADER$.

What does [Root.Monarch.GetName] say about this?
translation:
两位深受我们信赖的顾问，$MASTER_OF_MINT$ 和 $TRADER$，最近一直在磋商。有人认为他们在密谋，有人认为他们在为[Root.GetName]的未来绘制蓝图，不管他们在讨论什么，如此机密显然是备受争议的。

终于，他们向[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]呈现了结果，一堆厚厚的文件详细列举出了对国家传统贸易政策所需要进行的一系列大刀阔斧般的改革计划，包括加强保护主义、监管制度和产业政策的强化。有些人认为这太过激进。
$MASTER_OF_MINT$说：「这很有必要。」
$TRADER$说：「改革是有益的。」

那么[Root.Monarch.GetName]会如何评价呢？

original: Radical to simpler minds, perhaps, but not to the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle].
translation: 对于头脑简单的人来说确实是过于激进了，但是对于[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]来说显然不是这样。

original: $MASTER_OF_MINT$ is a bad influence on $TRADER$.
translation: $MASTER_OF_MINT$把$TRADER$给带坏了。

original: $TRADER$ has clearly radicalized $MASTER_OF_MINT$.
translation: $TRADER$很明显地把$MASTER_OF_MINT$给变得激进了。

original: Get out of there, both of you!
translation: 滚出去，你们俩一起！

original: Intercolonial Trade
translation: 殖民地之间的贸易

original: Establishing colonial subjects overseas has allowed us to expand our trade while remaining in control, importing goods from lands that are essentially under [Root.GetAdjective] control. As long as we supply our colony with what they need, they have no reason to start putting gold in the hands of our enemies.\n\nSadly, the settlers sometimes have a different opinion from our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] on what exactly they 'need'. They have begun to trade with neighboring colonies and natives, circumventing trade barriers we put up to protect our nation's interests. This clearly benefits them... but whether it benefits us is highly doubtful.
translation: 建立海外殖民领使我们能够促进贸易同时维系统治，从那些实质上被[Root.GetAdjective]所控制的区域进口商品。只要我们为殖民地提供他们需要的物资，他们没有理由把金子送到我们敌人的手中。\n\n不幸的是，对于什么才是他们真正「想要的」，殖民地居民有时候和[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]产生了不同的想法。他们开始与邻近的殖民地以及原住民做生意，绕过了那些我们设立的用于保护国家利益的贸易壁垒。他们确实从中获益……但是我们是否同样从中获益就不好说了。

original: They are part of [Root.GetName]. Our interests are theirs.
translation: 他们是[Root.GetName]的一部分。我们的利益就是他们的利益。

original: They are part of [Root.GetName]. Their interests are ours.
translation: 他们是[Root.GetName]的一部分。他们的利益就是我们的利益。

original: Chocolate Imports
translation: 巧克力进口

original: Prominent economists have been questioning the rapid increases in chocolate imports to our nation recently. After one of our neighbors came to control a large quantity of the world's known cocoa supply through deft trade practices, their confectionery has grown very popular even among [Root.GetAdjective] people. Protectionist politicians are now questioning whether such imports of luxury goods benefit [Root.GetName], arguing that growing dependent on a good which our neighbors control leads to gold flowing out of our nation.
translation: 著名经济学家对我国近期日益增长的巧克力进口量表示担忧。自从邻国通过取巧的贸易行为控制了一大片优良的可可豆产地，他们的饮品变得非常受欢迎，即使在[Root.GetAdjective]的人民中也是如此。 贸易保护主义派别的政治家如今正在质疑，这种类型的奢侈品进口能否让[Root.GetName]获益，他们认为这种依赖于我们邻国控制的商品的贸易增长会对我国的经济地位造成不利影响。

original: But a river of sweet, sweet chocolate is flowing into our nation.
translation: 但是一条甜蜜的巧克力之河正流入我们的国家。

original: Restrict imports of this sinful indulgence.
translation: 限制进口这种罪恶的放纵之物。

original: Put a negative spin on chocolate, replacing it with our positively spun sugar.
translation: 诽谤诋毁巧克力，用我们口碑良好的砂糖取代它。

original: Coffee Imports
translation: 咖啡进口

original: Prominent economists have been questioning the rapid increases in coffee imports to our nation recently. After one of our neighbors came to control a large quantity of the world's known coffee bean supply through deft trade practices, their beverages have grown very popular even among [Root.GetAdjective] people. Protectionist politicians are now questioning whether such imports of luxury goods benefit [Root.GetName], arguing that growing dependent on a good which our neighbors control weakens our economic position.
translation: 著名经济学家对我国近期日益增长的咖啡进口量表示担忧。自从邻国通过取巧的贸易行为控制了一大片优良的咖啡豆产地，他们的饮品变得非常受欢迎，即使在[Root.GetAdjective]的人民中也是如此。 贸易保护主义派别的政治家如今正在质疑，这种类型的奢侈品进口能否让[Root.GetName]获益,他们认为这种依赖于我们邻国控制的商品的贸易增长会对我国的经济地位造成不利影响。

original: Do these so-called economists have to deal with early mornings?
translation: 这些所谓的经济学家难道从来都不需要早起上班的么？

original: We must limit the spread of this unnatural narcotic.
translation: 我们必须阻止这种怪异的麻醉品蔓延开来.

original: We [Root.GetAdjective] are a tea-drinking people. We will have none of this.
translation: 我们[Root.GetAdjective]人都是茶叶的拥趸.我们才表喝黑黑的咖啡呢.

original: Tea Imports
translation: 茶叶进口

original: Prominent economists have been questioning the rapid increases in tea imports to our nation recently. After one of our neighbors came to control a large quantity of the world's known tea supply through deft trade practices, their beverages have grown very popular even among [Root.GetAdjective] people. Protectionist politicians are now questioning whether such imports of luxury goods benefit [Root.GetName], arguing that growing dependent on a good which our neighbors control weakens our economic position.
translation: 著名经济学家对我国近期日益增长的茶叶进口量表示担忧。自从邻国通过取巧的贸易行为控制了一大片优良的茶叶产地，他们的饮品变得非常受欢迎，即使在[Root.GetAdjective]的人民中也是如此。 贸易保护主义派别的政治家如今正在质疑，这种类型的奢侈品进口能否让[Root.GetName]获益,他们认为这种依赖于我们邻国控制的商品的贸易增长会对我国的经济地位造成不利影响。

original: If we discard tea, civilization will swiftly follow.
translation: 如果我们停止喝茶,文明就会坍塌.

original: We should dump their tea into the ocean!
translation: 我们要把他们的茶叶倒进海里!

original: Who needs tea when we have coffee?
translation: 都有咖啡了，谁还喝茶呀？
